feed.title: Huntarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.0.0
entry.content:
• Supports up to 9 Instances of each ARR program
  • Debugged the various Java Interface Issues
  • Ensures users saves settings if they leave the settings page
  • Display only configured apps on the homepage
  • Added connection checker for each instance of each ARR app
  • Added the ability to enable and disable instances of each ARR app
  • Place WARNING on Whisparr that it is currently not working (still working on it's API issues)

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.0.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • 6.0.2 Updates by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/174

  • Fixed duplication instance issues

  • Removed enabled/disabled redundant toggle from all apps (Sonarr was good)
  • Reduced password requirements from 10 to 8 characters

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/6.0.1...6.0.2

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.0.3
entry.content:
• Fixed Lidarr Upgrade Issues
  • Added Changelog Button to HomePage

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.0.6
entry.content:
Reverted to how 6.0.3 worked.

Version 6.0.4 will cause permission issues.
